main.name: Luka Batarelo
main.occupation: Full-stack developer, faculty teacher, business owner
main.description: The whole point of being alive is to improve myself in every aspect of life
main.bio: Hello everyone! My name is Luka and currently I work as a full-stack web developer. My side hustle is front-end web development, especially sharpening my React skills. Beside that I am also a faculty teacher on Faculty of Economics and Business and business owner. My main field of interest is React, web3, finances, investing and building amazing life. I love working and want to be part of someting huge. Plans for future are pretty huge, working every single day to improve myself and be on the right way.

education.degree: Master's Degree, Economics and Business - Management

work.title: Full-stack web developer
work.description: Working on internal applications which include a lot of data flow and data manipulation. Tech stack that I use daily: Java, SQL, git

work.title: Business owner
work.description: Leading business papers on my own, keeping books, currently having 1 employee

work.title: External Associate - teacher
work.description: Teaching students about business information systems, organizing teaching classes, organizing exams.

work.title: Taxi driver / courier
work.description: Driving and communicating with clients. Delivering food from restaurants to client's doors

testimonials.text: Habits are the compound interest of self-improvement
Start from wherever you are and with whatever youâ€™ve got.
